sentence.Network_en: The gospels state categorically that Christ possessed a purse.
sentence.Network_cn: 福音很清楚地提到基督拥有一个钱袋.

sentence.Network_en: The Lord's prayer is recorded twice in the gospels.
sentence.Network_cn: 总共有两卷福音书记载了这篇[主祷文].

sentence.Network_en: It is the most detailed of the 4 Gospels.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是四福音书当中最为详尽细致的一部.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the usual penalty for sedition was a humiliating death by crucifixion , but according to the gospels , the Roman governor Pontius Pilate ruled that Jesus was not guilty of any such civil crime .煽动暴乱的处决方式通常是被钉在十字架上，羞辱地死去，但根据福音书上所说，罗马总督彼拉多裁定，耶稣并没有犯任何的罪。
there are other times Jesus predicts his death by crucifixion in the gospels can you think of any ?在福音书里还有哪些其它章节提到耶稣预测自己会被钉在十字架上处死，你可以想得到吗？
in the gospels Jesus predicts the end of the world and the coming of the kingdom of God .在福音书中，耶稣预言世界的末了，以及神国的降临。
then when we retire we can write the gospels ., 到时退了休就写福音书去.

entry.tran: 福音书（《圣经·新约》中记录耶稣基督生平和教诲的四卷书）
entry.def: In the New Testament of the Bible, the Gospels are the four books which describe the life and teachings of Jesus Christ.

example.ex: ...an illustrated and illuminated manuscript of the four gospels.
example.tran: 配有插图、装饰华美的四福音书手抄本

entry.tran: 福音（耶稣的启示和教义）
entry.def: In the Christian religion, the gospel refers to the message and teachings of Jesus Christ, as explained in the New Testament.

example.ex: I didn't shirk my duties. I visited the sick and I preached the gospel.
example.tran: 我没有逃避职责，我探望病人，也宣讲福音。

entry.def: You can use gospel to refer to a particular way of thinking that a person or group believes in very strongly and that they try to persuade others to accept.

example.ex: It taught only materialism, the gospel of mammon.
example.tran: 它只是宣扬金钱至上的物欲主义。

entry.tran: 福音音乐（尤流行于美国南部黑人基督徒中）
entry.def: Gospel or gospel music is a style of religious music that uses strong rhythms and vocal harmony. It is especially popular among black Christians in the southern United States of America.

example.ex: I had to go to church, so I grew up singing gospel...
example.tran: 我必须去教堂做礼拜，因此我是唱着福音歌长大的。

example.ex: The group perform variations on soul and gospel music.
example.tran: 这个乐队演奏灵歌和福音音乐的变奏曲。

entry.def: If you take something as gospel, or as gospel truth, you believe that it is completely true.

example.ex: The results were not to be taken as gospel...
example.tran: 别以为这些结果就一定是正确的。

example.ex: He wouldn't say this if it weren't the gospel truth.
example.tran: 要不是对此深信不疑，他不会说这样的话。

means.word_mean: 1. four books in the New Testament that tell the story of Christ's life and teachings
